props.useLoader: Enable or disable the spinner in the input
props.isLoading: If true displays a spinner in the input. Spinner should be first enabled in the `use-loading` prop
props.singleLineMessage: Limits the number of displayed errors to one at a time. Order of the messages is the same as order of the `rules` in rules prop
props.showIndicator: Set to `true` or `false` to show open indicator. Useful for extending v-input for example adding dropdowns or popovers
props.indicatorSwitch: Set to `true` or `false` to set the state of the open indicator. Useful for extending v-input for example adding dropdowns or popovers
props.width: Width of the component in px
props.label: Label on top of the input. This label is for simple forms as position cannot be changed
props.noMessages: If `true` validation messages are not displayed
props.spinner: Attributes of the inputs v-spinner component (loader)
props.closeButton: Attributes of the inputs v-close-button component (clear button)
props.chevron: Attributes of the inputs v-chevron component (indicator)
props.formText: Attributes of the v-form-text component (validation messages)
props.modInput: Style of the main input element
props.modCloseButtonWrapper: Style of the wrapper element of the clear button
props.icon: Adds an icon to the input element. Valid value is the same as in v-icon components
props.clearable: Adds the 'X' button that resets model to the default value
props.customClearable: Adds the 'X' button that only emits the @click:clear-button event. It does not modify model value

emits.click:clear-button: Emitted after clicking clear button (if the `custom-clearable` prop is set)

slots.label: Slot for the label. Slot props: `label` (from label prop)
slots.prepend: Slot for the content prepending input
slots._input-extra: Slot for the extra values that prepend input element (for example the v-select component uses this slot to render selected items in multiple mode)
slots._input-control-extra: Slot for the extra control elements after clear button (for example the v-select component uses this slot to show toggle menu indicator)
slots.append: Slot for the content appending input
